channel.title: Reserving on Katrien Antonio
channel.description: Recent content in Reserving on Katrien Antonio

item.title: Loss reserving
item.description: An overview of published and ongoing research papers within the loss or claims reserving research line developed in my lab. This research line puts focus on IBNR models for individual claims RBNS models for individual claims. These contributions are refined versions of a stream of older papers in which I first explored the use of granular data in claims reserving. See my SSRN page for the references to these contributions.
